main event: Two triangular shaped objects were sighted near Monticello, New York on July 22, 1955.
interesting points: The objects were described as triangular in shape and about 1 foot in length., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The observer was a 13-year-old amateur astronomer., The object had a bright light in its center and appeared to move very fast., The conclusion of the sighting was that the objects were likely aircraft.
